Get Top Quality Sound

We specialize in coaching and teaching. We help you get the best recording, editing, mixing, and mastering possible. Live video consultations catered to your needs.

More Info

What We Do

Engineering

We teach you how to record. How to read your volume levels. How to edit your audio files. How to mix and master including techniquies to achieve certain sounds

Support

We offer tech support if you have a issue with you hardware or software. We can help through facetime to get you up and running

Setup

We can help you with setting up your studio. With the proper setup you can achieve a better sound. Need assistance wiring your studio equipment together. We can help
